RMIController - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.rmi

run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.communication.socket.SocketClientHandler
Executes the SocketClientHandler core logic: forwards every NetworkMessage received from the client-side application to the CommunicationHub for proper handling until an MessageType.UNREGISTER_REQUEST type of NetworkMessage is received or if any exception is throw at a lower level.
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.executable.RMIServer
Creates and binds all the properties needed to the default RMI Registry in order to allow the remote clients to connect to the Server by invoking the desired RMIServerController methods.
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.executable.SocketServer
Listens for every possible client that may join the {code Server} and create a separate thread for each of them by instantiating a different SocketClientHandler with the client own Socket reference.
